title: Ask HN: Books for Effective Communication
author: 2bor-2n
story_text:
Being very good at writing and speaking are very valuable skills that come in handy in all situations in life.

What books have you read or want to recommend to enhance these skills?

Any specific book that changed how you articulate your ideas and thoughts?
